Body:
<img/>

However, Hong wants start with a positive integer between 1 and 3999 and produce its Roman numeral form, the reverse of the
above process, as shown in the following examples:

<img/>
Input:
Each test case consists of a single integer 1 ≤ R ≤ 3999 with an unknown number of integers per line separated by
whitespace and an unknown number of lines in the input file. There will be less than 100 test cases.
Output:
For each test case, output one line formatted as shown in the sample output. The line contains the input integer
followed by “ -> ” and its Roman numeral form.
